var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "Dnt": "1",
    "Pragma": "no-cache",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua": '"Google Chrome";v="123", "Not:A-Brand";v="8", "Chromium";v="123"',
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile": "?1",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform": '"Android"',
    "Upgrade-Insecure-Requests": "1",
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "Accept": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7",
    "X-Requested-With": "cn.nr19.mbrowser",
    "Sec-Fetch-Site": "same-origin",
    "Sec-Fetch-Mode": "navigate",
    "Sec-Fetch-User": "?1",
    "Sec-Fetch-Dest": "document",
    "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, zstd",
    "Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7",
    "Origin": Get('url'),
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank1 = [
    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];
orderby1 = [
    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];
for (i in rank1) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(51, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架'
];
name = [
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo-lianzai',
    'hanguo-wanjie',
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo',
    'riben',
    'riben-lianzai',
    'riben-wanjie',
    'riben',
    'riben',
    'dalu',
    'dalu-lianzai',
    'dalu-wanjie',
    'dalu',
    'dalu',
    'oumei',
    'oumei-lianzai',
    'oumei-wanjie',
    'oumei',
    'oumei'
];
type = [
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/app/comic/index?sort=${type[i]}&filter=${name[i]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    韩漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(6, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    日本    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(12, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    国漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(18, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    欧美    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 UBrowser/6.2.4094.1 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  更　　新  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '周一',
    '周二',
    '周三',
    '周四',
    '周五',
    '周六',
    '周日'
];
orderby = [
    '1',
    '2',
    '3',
    '4',
    '5',
    '6',
    '7'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/gengxin/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','长条','大女主','百合','耽美','纯爱','後宫','韩漫',
    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',
    '职场','萌系','冒险','治愈','都市','霸总','神鬼','侦探',
    '爱情','古风','欢乐向','科幻','穿越','性转换','校园','美食',
    '剧情','热血','节操','励志','异世界','历史','战争','恐怖'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
    State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/shudan/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(8, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
//exploreUrl.splice(31, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
    St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
    State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
    Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(31, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=')) {
    Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
    var list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
    var user = list.screenname;
    var fav = String(list.itemname);
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_1", fav.replace(/@/, 'fav-'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_2", fav.replace(/@/, '%40'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
} else {
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1",'');
}
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    Fav1 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_1");
    Fav2 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_2");
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
MY = Get('my');
for (i in MY) {
    let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨书籍✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部文本', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}texts${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}texts?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部书籍', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}books${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}books?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
TEXT = Get('text');
for (i in TEXT) {
    let title = TEXT[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = TEXT[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨视频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部视频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}movies${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}movies?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
VIDEO = Get('video');
for (i in VIDEO) {
    let title = VIDEO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = VIDEO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨音频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}audio${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}audio?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音乐', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}etree${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}etree?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
AUDIO = Get('audio');
for (i in AUDIO) {
    let title = AUDIO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = AUDIO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨图像✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部图像', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}image${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}image?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
IMAGE = Get('image');
for (i in IMAGE) {
    let title = IMAGE[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = IMAGE[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

}

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
for (j in kind) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(41, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

            Data();
        }

    data = JSON.stringify(data);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '推荐',
    '最新',
    '热门'
];
orderby = [
    'ranks?date_type=total&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=month&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=week&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=day&_update=true',
    'recs?pos=3200102',
    'comics?ordering=-datetime_updated',
    'comics?ordering=-popular'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/${orderby[i]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','爱情','欢乐向','冒险','奇幻','百合','校园','科幻',
    '东方','耽美','生活','格斗','轻小说','悬疑','神鬼','职场',
    'TL','萌系','治愈','长条','四格','节操','舰娘','竞技',
    '搞笑','伪娘','热血','励志','性转换','彩色','后宫','美食',
    '侦探','AA','音乐舞蹈','魔幻','战争','历史','异世界','惊悚',
    '机战','都市','穿越','恐怖','C100','重生','C99','C101',
    'C97','C96','生存','宅系','武侠','C98','C95','FATE',
    '转生','无修正','仙侠','LoveLive','其他'
];
theme = [
    '','&theme=aiqing','&theme=huanlexiang','&theme=maoxian','&theme=qihuan','&theme=baihe','&theme=xiaoyuan','&theme=kehuan',
    '&theme=dongfang','&theme=danmei','&theme=shenghuo','&theme=gedou','&theme=qingxiaoshuo','&theme=xuanyi','&theme=shengui','&theme=zhichang',
    '&theme=teenslove','&theme=mengxi','&theme=zhiyu','&theme=changtiao','&theme=sige','&theme=jiecao','&theme=jianniang','&theme=jingji',
    '&theme=gaoxiao','&theme=weiniang','&theme=rexue','&theme=lizhi','&theme=xingzhuanhuan','&theme=COLOR','&theme=hougong','&theme=meishi',
    '&theme=zhentan','&theme=aa','&theme=yinyuewudao','&theme=mohuan','&theme=zhanzheng','&theme=lishi','&theme=yishijie','&theme=jingsong',
    '&theme=jizhan','&theme=dushi','&theme=chuanyue','&theme=kongbu','&theme=comiket100','&theme=chongsheng','&theme=comiket99','&theme=comiket101',
    '&theme=comiket97','&theme=comiket96','&theme=shengcun','&theme=zhaixi','&theme=wuxia','&theme=comiket98','&theme=comiket95','&theme=fate',
    '&theme=zhuansheng','&theme=Uncensored','&theme=xianxia','&theme=loveLive','&theme=qita'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Ordering = `{{get('ordering',Get('p'))}}`;
    Top = `{{get('top',Get('o'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/comics${Ordering}${Top}${theme[j]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(91, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(92, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 UBrowser/6.2.4094.1 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

    data = Data1();

];

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));

        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/index.php/search/' + e + '/{{page}}';
}(key));

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
    End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],

      wikiLink
      comicCount
      views
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}';

}(key));

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
for (j in kind) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(41, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap()["账号："] : '');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay-albums a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
    O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
    Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;

    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];

    '排行',

];

];

}

];
